sense.gloss: advertising the excellence of one's wares, boasting, self-advertisement
statement of the virtues of a medicine, description of the virtues of a drug
x: 効能書き・こうのうがき

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓、↑能書↑↓|のうが↓き|ばかり↑立派↑↓りっぱ↓だけど、↑言↑↓い↓うは↑易↑↓やす↓く↑行↑↓おこな↓うは↑難↑↓かた↓し、ってこと↑分↑↓わ↓かってんのかなあ。
sdata.e: His boosterism makes it sound wonderful but I wonder if he understands how hard it's going to be to actually carry out.
